resources.string: Why do we need costumes, weapons, etc.?
It’s just the scenery. For now…
How to get new features?
Unlock them in your inventory in the contribution "Features"!
What is the coin for?
Coins are needed to spend them! You can do this in your inventory by unlocking something.
Why are crystals needed?
They also need coins to buy and unlock various things.
Where are the settings?
Go to the tab of the hero and click on the gear to the right of his name.
How to earn coins?
Do your tasks!
How to earn crystals?
Crystals can be obtained for new achievements.
How to create a task?
Go to the first tab and click on the plus button in the lower right corner.
How to improve skills?
Perform tasks, choosing a skill that you want to improve.
How to resize text?
The text size can be changed in the settings.
How do I delete/edit/complete tasks?
Move the task to the left or right.
How do I delete/edit skills?
Move the skill to the left or right.
